text: The black metaltail (Metallura phoebe) is a species of hummingbird. It can be found in Bolivia and Peru. It lives in subtropical or tropical moist montanes and subtropical or tropical high-altitude shrubland. == References == * BirdLife International 2004. Metallura phoebe. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 10 July 2007. Category:Birds of South America Category:Hummingbirds
title: Black metaltail
